name: The Nelson Chair
description: Distinguished without being old-fashioned, bold without being excessive, the Nelson is a luxurious seating solution for a home that doesn't shy away from style. With its gently tapering legs finished in a deep sycamore black, this design presents an inimitable and captivating silhouette. Carefully chosen details such as the deep buttoning provide the perfect accents for this glamorous chair that would be perfect in any dining room, office, board room or even in a smart lobby. Style the Nelson effortlessly by choosing a fabric or leather upholstery to suit any interior.
